meanings.definition: An object used to hold down loose papers on a desk.
meanings.sent1: I placed the paperweight on top of my important documents to keep them from flying away.
meanings.sent2: The glass paperweight added a touch of elegance to the cluttered desk.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous breeze tried to play with the papers, but the paperweight said, 'Not today!'
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a sturdy paperweight, keeping her grounded amidst chaos.
meanings.sent5: The heavy paperweight pressed firmly on the stack of papers, ensuring they stayed put.

meanings.definition: A decorative item placed on top of papers to prevent them from blowing away.
meanings.sent1: The colorful paperweight sparkled in the sunlight, holding down the loose papers.
meanings.sent2: She carefully selected a unique paperweight to adorn her desk.
meanings.sent3: The paperweight seemed to whisper to the papers, 'Stay put, my friends.'
meanings.sent4: His words were like a paperweight, anchoring her thoughts in place.
meanings.sent5: The delicate paperweight delicately balanced on the stack of papers, a silent guardian.
